frame.name: Manipulate_into_doing
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Manipulator</fen> gets his <fen>Victim</fen> to perform a <fen>Resulting_action</fen> against what their better judgment would have been at the time. The means by which the <fen>Manipulator</fen> overcomes or bypasses the <fen>Victim</fen>'s resistance to act need not be linguistic expression. In some cases, the <fen>Goods</fen> may stand in for a <fen>Resulting_action</fen> of the <fen>Victim</fen> giving the <fen>Manipulator</fen> the <fen>Goods</fen>. <ex></ex> <ex>Are you trying to tell me that <fex name="Manipulator">Ace</fex> <t>blackmailed</t> <fex name="Victim">you</fex> <fex name="Resulting_action">into becoming his lover</fex>?</ex>
<ex><fex name="Manipulator">Stephanopoulos</fex> <fex name="Manner">skillfully</fex> <t>cajoles</t> <fex name="Victim">him</fex> <fex name="Resulting_action">into keeping quiet</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manipulator
FE.definition: <def-root>The person who gets the Victim to act against their interest. </def-root>

FE.name: Victim
FE.definition: <def-root>The person who the Manipulator gets to do something they would not have done had no pressure or deception been applied.</def-root>

FE.name: Resulting_action
FE.definition: <def-root>What the <fen>Manipulator</fen> intends to make the <fen>Victim</fen> do and the <fen>Victim</fen> actually does.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which an event occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An act of the <fen>Manipulator</fen> that enables them to alter the action of the <fen>Victim</fen>. <ex>I <t>badgered</t> her into coming <fex name="Mns">by calling her every five minutes</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Goods
FE.definition: <def-root>The FE goods is anything (including labor, time, or legal rights) that can be taken away. <ex>Leslie <t>blackmailed</t> <fex name="Goods">the watch</fex> out of John.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition: <def-root>An entity that the <fen>Manipulator</fen> uses to get the <fen>Victim</fen> to perform the <fen>Resulting_action</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>A state-of-affairs that the <fen>Manipulator</fen> is hoping to bring about by manipulating the <fen>Victim</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including metaphorical force (hard, softly), secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may also indicate salient characteristics of a <fen>Manipulator</fen> that also affect the action (presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully). </def-root>

lexUnit.name: deceive.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: deliberately mislead or misrepresent the truth to

lexUnit.name: defraud.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: llegally obtain money from (someone) by deception

lexUnit.name: con.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: deceive (someone) into doing or believing something by lying to them

lexUnit.name: badger.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: repeatedly and annoyingly ask (someone) to do something

lexUnit.name: trick.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: deceive or outwit with cunning or skill

lexUnit.name: flatter.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: avish compliments on, especially in order to further one's own interests

lexUnit.name: lure.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: tempt to do something or to go somewhere

lexUnit.name: cheat.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: act dishonestly or unfairly in order to gain an advantage

lexUnit.name: manipulate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: control or influence cleverly or unscrupulously

lexUnit.name: harass.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: torment by subjecting to constant interference or intimidation

lexUnit.name: blackmail.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: use threats or unfair manipulation in an attempt to influence someone's actions

lexUnit.name: cajole.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: persuade (someone) to do something by sustained coaxing or flattery

lexUnit.name: hustle.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to pressure or coerce (someone) to buy or do something
